originalText.text: We had 2 area rugs with pet stains. ! area rug had an ivory background  that we thought was a lost cause. The price was good so they took the rugs that day. The following Friday they called to ask if they could treat that rug  more time. OK. THAT RUG WAS AMAZING. It was pure ivory. We were so happy with both rugs.

originalText.text: I have used other cleaners in the past and Carpet Cleaning UES is far better in service and follow up than all others. Crew was very professional and did the job thoroughly, but quickly. He picked up the rug I purchased from west elm and got rid of the mess my dog left.

originalText.text:
Great Carpet & rug cleaning company in the upper east side.
They came pick up my wool area rug cleaned it in their warehouse and gave it back in 7 days with free shipping. Also cleaned my bedroom carpet and was able to took out all stains.
Thank you
